list.description_render:
MyCryptons uses ERC-721 tokens to populate an alternative reality world of famous personalities where players can collect unique digital personalities called "Cryptons", engage in political expression and social media interaction through their Cryptons and play their Cryptons in games and competitions on the platform.

Each Crypton is beautifully represented by a unique handcrafted image and has a short edgy gagline which owners can personalize and share on social media. 

Cryptons can be snatched by other users if they pay the price set by the Smart Contract but owners can also buy protection and are able to set their own snatch price. Owners of Cryptons will also share in revenue from games and activities that involve their Cryptons.

Cryptons represent game pieces in the Social Media 4.0 environment we are creating.
list.title: MyCryptons

list.description_render:
In World of Ether, users discover, collect, battle, breed, and sell a variety of monsters all living on the Ethereum blockchain.

The game is founded by Alain Goldman, co-founder of the largest Ethereum meetup group in the world, and his brother, Stanley Goldman, who's a senior developer at GitHub.

list.description_render: On The Ethereum lottery you take your chance to win more Ether just with one click. Place your bet and wait for the rewards! More than 1/20 bets get a reward. The reward accumulates until enough money fills the bucket. The lottery procces works totaly depending on the Ethereum blockchain, with no random dependent algorithms nor human controlled procedures.

list.description_render: HashWorld is the world’s first blockchain game with virtual economic qualities--a blockchain version of monopoly. You can play games to “mine” tokens and complete tasks to obtain high-value digital currency such as bitcoin! Then you can bid iconic lands around the world using your digital asset. Based on blockchain technology, HashWorld is able to guarantee that each piece of virtual land is unique, freehold, and free to trade. Come and become a millionaire in HashWorld!
list.title: Hashworld

list.description_render: A Brand new way to earn Ethereum! This smart contract game allows you to earn 2% of whatever you invest every single day. Your profit is accrued every second, and can be withdrawn anytime. You also have full control over your capital. It's a HYIP on a smart contract, and fully transparent. You never need to worry about a exit scam or someone taking all the money and leaving.

list.description_render:
Multilevel Referral is a completely new concept in the blockchain gaming arena where the entire gameplay pivots around referring people to the game and earn ethers for every referral (direct and indirect referrals upto 4 levels). 

The game is pretty similar to any other multi-level pyramid scheme but instead of selling any virtual product, it works on selling the referrals itself. You just need to follow two simple steps and you can see an exponential growth in your earnings very soon.
list.title: Eth Multilevel Referral
